Even as he flinches in pain Cutie fires 3 shots
directly at the other bot. He doubts he can stand up
to a younger more energitic bot in close range combat
(let alone damaged), so he runs back 8 steps. Every 2
steps he fires, then at the end he fires 1 last time
(that's eight).

OOC: Are you going to answer me about that bot I
suggested?
